titleStmt.title: Chuse which you will, liberty or slavery: or, An impartial representation of the danger of being again subjected to a popish prince
Character of a bigotted prince.
titleStmt.author: Ames, Richard, d. 1693.

notesStmt.note: The same sheets as "The character of a bigotted prince" with different title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
